header.name: OBI-JUAN KENOBI
header.subtitle: Code master and guardian of good design

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.description: Digital world builder, Jedi design apprentice, and occasional pixel smuggler. Minimalism lover, but always ready to shoot a sci-fi easter egg into any interface.

items.title: PROJECT HOTH
items.longDescription: Advanced monitoring system developed for extreme conditions. Includes predictive analytics, real-time alerts, and cryogenic data visualization. Designed to withstand the most hostile conditions in the universe.

items.title: TATOOINE INITIATIVE
items.longDescription: Revolutionary marketplace connecting traders across the galaxy. Decentralized payment system, automated logistics, and anti-smuggling protection. Real-time transaction processing.

items.title: BESPIN CONCEPT
items.longDescription: Complete visual identity for cloud services platform. Includes modular design system, reusable components, and style guides. Focus on lightness and floating elegance.

items.title: STARSHIP UX
items.longDescription: Immersive space navigation experience with gestural controls, augmented reality, and haptic feedback. Design focused on usability under high-speed and stress conditions.

items.quote: Working with him is like having an astromech droid on the team: precise, reliable, and with ingenious surprises.
items.author: Leia Organa

items.quote: A true design Jedi. His interfaces make even a Wookiee feel comfortable browsing.
items.author: Han Solo

items.quote: If the Death Star had his UI, it would never have exploded.
items.author: Darth Vader

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: Got a mission? Connect the intergalactic transmission and send your coordinates.

about.title: About this project
about.description: An interactive portfolio inspired by Star Wars with holographic effects, smooth animations and an immersive user experience.
